p: Killing kinetics of the bacterial cells. The two EOs (ZEO and OEO) indicating the MBC values less than 3.00 mg mL -1 decreased the number of organisms after 4 hr. The ZEO could kill 85.00% of the E.coli O157:H7 and S.putrefaciens cells within 4 hr ( Fig. 1A). It could kill only 60.00% of the P. fluorescens and L. monocytogenes cells within 4 hr; then following 12 hr, it killed almost 70.00% of the P. fluorescens and L. monocytogenes cells. The OEO could kill about 80.00% of the E. coli O157:H7 and S. putrefaciens cells within 4 hr ( Fig. 1B). It could kill only 50.00% of the P. fluorescens and L. monocytogenes cells.
